targets.rawSql: SELECT SrcAS, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcAS > 0 GROUP BY SrcAS ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT DstAS, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND DstAS > 0 GROUP BY DstAS ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT SrcAS, DstAS, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes, sum(Packets) as total_packets, count() as flow_count FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcAS > 0 AND DstAS > 0 GROUP BY SrcAS, DstAS ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT $__timeInterval(TimeReceived) as time, sum(Bytes) as transit_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) AND SrcAS != DstAS AND SrcAS > 0 AND DstAS > 0 GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
